displayName.thai: คุณมาถึงชั้น 15 แล้ว!

description.english: It was a tough challenge but you did it.
description.german: Es war eine harte Herausforderung, aber du hast es geschafft.
description.french: C'était un défi difficile mais vous l'avez réussi.
description.italian: È stata una sfida difficile ma ce l'hai fatta.
description.spanish: Fue un desafío difícil pero lo lograste.
description.schinese: 这是一个艰巨的挑战，但你做到了。
description.tchinese: 這是一個艱鉅的挑戰，但你做到了。
description.russian: Это было непростое испытание, но вы справились.
description.thai: มันเป็นความท้าทายที่ยากแต่คุณก็ทำได้
description.japanese: 難しい挑戦でしたが、あなたはやり遂げました。
description.portuguese: Foi um desafio difícil, mas você conseguiu.
description.polish: To było trudne wyzwanie, ale dałeś radę.
description.danish: Det var en hård udfordring, men du klarede det.
description.dutch: Het was een zware uitdaging, maar je hebt het gedaan.
description.finnish: Se oli kova haaste, mutta teit sen.
description.norwegian: Det var en tøff utfordring, men du klarte det.
description.swedish: Det var en tuff utmaning men du klarade det.
description.brazilian: Foi um desafio difícil, mas você conseguiu.

displayName.thai: ประตู A เปิดแล้ว!

description.english: You got the highest rank in the game!
description.german: Du hast den höchsten Rang im Spiel erreicht!
description.french: Vous avez obtenu le rang le plus élevé du jeu !
description.italian: Hai ottenuto il grado più alto nel gioco!
description.koreana: 당신은 게임에서 가장 높은 순위를 얻었습니다!
description.spanish: ¡Obtuviste el rango más alto del juego!
description.schinese: 您在游戏中获得了最高排名！
description.tchinese: 您在遊戲中獲得了最高排名！
description.russian: Вы получили высший ранг в игре!
description.thai: คุณได้รับอันดับสูงสุดในเกม!
description.japanese: ゲーム内で最高ランクを獲得しました！
description.portuguese: Você obteve a classificação mais alta do jogo!
description.danish: Du fik den højeste rang i spillet!
description.dutch: Je hebt de hoogste rang in het spel!
description.norwegian: Du fikk den høyeste rangeringen i spillet!
description.swedish: Du fick den högsta rankingen i spelet!
description.brazilian: Você obteve a classificação mais alta do jogo!

displayName.thai: ประตู B เปิดแล้ว!

description.english: You've got the intermediate level in the game!
description.german: Du hast das mittlere Level im Spiel erreicht!
description.french: Vous avez le niveau intermédiaire dans le jeu !
description.italian: Hai raggiunto il livello intermedio nel gioco!
description.spanish: ¡Tienes el nivel intermedio en el juego!
description.schinese: 您已达到游戏中级水平！
description.russian: У вас средний уровень в игре!
description.thai: คุณมีระดับกลางในเกมแล้ว!
description.japanese: ゲームの中級レベルはもう達成しました！
description.portuguese: Você atingiu o nível intermediário do jogo!
description.dutch: Je hebt het tussenniveau in het spel!
description.brazilian: Você atingiu o nível intermediário do jogo!

displayName.thai: ประตู C เปิดแล้ว!

description.english: You got the mediocre rating in the game!
description.german: Du hast im Spiel die mittelmäßige Bewertung erhalten!
description.french: Vous avez obtenu une note médiocre dans le jeu !
description.italian: Hai ottenuto il punteggio mediocre nel gioco!
description.spanish: ¡Obtuviste una calificación mediocre en el juego!
description.schinese: 你在游戏中的评分很一般！
description.tchinese: 你在遊戲中的評分很普通！
description.russian: У тебя посредственный рейтинг в игре!
description.thai: คุณได้รับคะแนนปานกลางในเกม!
description.japanese: ゲームでの評価は平凡です!
description.portuguese: Você obteve a classificação medíocre no jogo!
description.danish: Du fik den middelmådige vurdering i spillet!
description.dutch: Je hebt de middelmatige beoordeling in het spel!
description.norwegian: Du fikk den middelmådige vurderingen i spillet!
description.swedish: Du fick det mediokra betyget i spelet!
description.brazilian: Você obteve a classificação medíocre no jogo!
